name: Wells Fargo Retirement 401(k) Plan
description: A tax-advantaged retirement savings plan with employer matching contributions and a diverse range of investment options.
features: Pre-tax contributions reduce current taxable income

name: Wells Fargo Traditional IRA
description: A traditional Individual Retirement Account (IRA) that allows tax-deferred growth on your investments until retirement.

name: Wells Fargo Roth IRA
description: A Roth IRA that allows for tax-free growth and tax-free withdrawals in retirement, ideal for those expecting higher future tax rates.

name: Wells Fargo 30-Year Fixed Mortgage
description: A fixed-rate mortgage with a 30-year term, providing stable monthly payments for the life of the loan.

name: Wells Fargo 15-Year Fixed Mortgage
description: A fixed-rate mortgage with a 15-year term, offering faster equity building and lower total interest costs.
features: Own your home in half the time

name: Wells Fargo Diversified Investment Portfolio
description: A professionally managed investment portfolio designed to balance growth and risk according to your financial goals.

name: Wells Fargo Growth Investment Portfolio
description: An aggressive investment portfolio focused on capital appreciation for those with higher risk tolerance.

name: Wells Fargo Income-Focused Portfolio
description: A conservative investment portfolio designed to generate steady income while preserving capital.

name: Wells Fargo High-Yield Savings Account
description: A savings account offering higher interest rates than standard savings accounts for growing your emergency fund or short-term savings.

name: Wells Fargo Money Market Account
description: A money market account that offers check-writing privileges and competitive interest rates for your short-term savings.
features: Higher interest rates than regular savings

name: Wells Fargo Rewards Credit Card
description: A rewards credit card that earns points on everyday purchases, redeemable for travel, merchandise, or cash back.

name: Wells Fargo Cash Back Credit Card
description: A cash back credit card that provides a percentage of your spending back as cash rewards.
features: Earn cash back on every purchase
Higher cash back in select categories

name: Wells Fargo Personal Loan
description: A flexible personal loan with competitive rates for debt consolidation, home improvements, or major purchases.

name: Wells Fargo Auto Loan
description: An auto loan with competitive rates for new or used vehicle purchases or refinancing existing auto loans.

name: Wells Fargo Student Loan
description: A student loan designed to help cover educational expenses with flexible repayment options.
features: Cover up to 100% of cost of attendance
